dmca.title: please stop the website saradaga.com !!!Urgently
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal
<http://www.theplanet.com/legal> .

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


________________________________

From: dheerajreddy [mailto:dheerajreddy_99@yahoo.com] 
Posted At: Saturday, September 16, 2006 3:44 AM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: please stop the website saradaga.com !!!Urgently
Subject: please stop the website saradaga.com !!!Urgently


Dear sir,
 
We found a website http://www.saradaga.com/, which is streaming movies
and other video content with out competent authorization. Eventually, it
is also learnt that the site is being connected to worldwide web through
your IP. We request you take necessary against the above website, which
is indulging in the usage of the other websites and spreding videos
through its web pages. 
 
Please find the IP address that is linked up with this website. 
IP ADDRESS: 70.86.120.131 US UNITED STATES  TEXAS DALLAS THEPLANET.COM
INTERNET SERVICES INC
 
 please lookinto attachment images. second image with telugu movies
URL's
 
 
Thanking you
 sir
reddy.
